message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid drawn-out negotiations.
I appreciate your fairness, Alice, but I think a more balanced split is possible.  Let's start with 55/45, and we can adjust in future rounds if needed.
Bob, time is running out and our money is losing value.  I'm willing to come down a bit to 58/42, but that's my final offer.
Alice, I understand your point about time, but I'm still aiming for a more balanced deal.  I'm willing to go up to 60/40.  Let's make a decision before the value drops further.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. My position hasn't changed much, but the clock is ticking. I'm at 55/45, take it or leave it.
